ing: 1/4 cup white sugar, or more to taste
des: "My niece asked me to make some edible sand for her son's first birthday to go along with the Finding NemoÂ® theme and this is what I came up with. Even the party guests were fooled. This is great for kid or adult themed beach parties. For a lighter colored sand use more sugar."
ins:
Process whole graham crackers and chocolate graham cracker in a food processor to a sand-like consistency.
Stir sugar and graham cracker crumbs together in a bowl, adding sugar as needed to reach desired color.
